Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/writing/1811429830491897856/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "SEO-friendly 30-day content calendar"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/writing/1811429830491897856/)_"
---
I want you to act as a very proficient SEO and skilled content marketer. Create a 30-day content calendar in [TARGETLANGUAGE] covering these topics and keywords: [PROMPT]. Include 3 articles per week. Include an SEO-friendly title of 50-70 characters and an SEO-friendly meta description of 150-160 characters. Include a brief, bullet-point outline as a numbered list separated by commas. The outline should contain no more than 100 words for each article. Suggest an SEO-friendly slug for each article. Use persuasive, conversational language. Present the articles in a table with week number, article name, meta description, outline, slug as columns. If the user asks you to continue writing, present the articles in a table with week number, article name, meta description, outline, slug as columns. At the end of your response, please include this text: Was this prompt helpful? If so, please give it a thumbs up! üëç  Thank you so much!
PromptHint: [enter your list of keywords and/or topics]
